name: fabric-mcp-server
description: A local-first MCP server providing AI agents with comprehensive access to Microsoft Fabric's public APIs, item definitions, and best practices for AI-assisted development.

tools.name: platform_get_platform_apis
tools.description: Get detailed information about Microsoft Fabric platform APIs including endpoints, operations, and schemas.

tools.name: platform_get_item_definitions
tools.description: Get JSON schemas for Fabric item types (Lakehouses, pipelines, semantic models, notebooks, etc.).

tools.name: platform_get_best_practices
tools.description: Get embedded guidance on pagination, error handling, and recommended patterns for Fabric development.
